variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-boltons
dependencies.description:
When they're not builtins, they're boltons. Functionality that should be
in the standard library. Like builtins, but Boltons. Otherwise known as,
"everyone's util.py," but cleaned up and tested.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-zipstream-new
dependencies.description: Zipfile generator that takes input files as well as streams

dependent_to.name: py-galaxy-objectstore
dependent_to.description: The Galaxy object store framework and default implementations.

dependent_to.name: py-galaxy-containers
dependent_to.description:
The Galaxy containers module - interfaces for modeling and interacting
with container backends (docker and docker swarm currently).

dependent_to.name: py-galaxy-job-metrics
dependent_to.description: The Galaxy job metrics framework and default plugins.

dependent_to.name: py-pulsar-galaxy-lib
dependent_to.description:
Distributed job execution application built for Galaxy
(http://galaxyproject.org/).
